document_data.name: Flesh Mirage
document_data.mainbody: '''''Flesh mirage''''' was a [[spell]] used by wizards in [[Anauroch]] and [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Effects: With this spell the caster could switch faces with another creature, living or dead. This spell did not affect the [[undead]]. The caster and target did not gain or lose any sensory abilities when switching faces. This spell radiated a small amount of necromantic magic.
document_data.Components: This spell required a [[material component]]s in the form of a bit of [[plaster]], glue, and a [[mirror]] to cast.
